target_markets.market_description: Mid-market companies and agencies needing AI implementation guidance
pain_points: Lack of AI education and implementation knowledge
target_markets.market_size_indicators: 3,000 leads over past 2 years requesting AI consultation conversations

problems_validated.problem: Businesses cannot identify where to implement AI in their operations
problems_validated.severity: High - companies with allocated AI budgets scrambling for solutions
problems_validated.market_gap: Even software companies struggle to figure out AI implementation points

business_strategies.implementation: Start with 45-minute discovery calls, then develop custom solutions
business_strategies.expected_results: Better product-market fit exploration and immediate revenue
business_strategies.case_study: Two sales leads interested in consultancy for AI dashboard implementation and Fortune 50 company development partnerships

business_strategies.strategy: Leverage existing lead database for consultancy outreach
business_strategies.implementation: Reach out to 3,000 past Morningside AI leads offering free 45-minute discovery calls
business_strategies.expected_results: High booking volume and market validation
business_strategies.case_study: Planning to use this as both discovery and product-market fit exploration

business_strategies.strategy: Annual clarity day retreats for strategic alignment
business_strategies.implementation: Senior leadership team off-site with end-of-year goals working backwards to quarterly, monthly, and weekly scorecards
business_strategies.expected_results: Team alignment and clear goal setting
business_strategies.case_study: 3-day retreat to Waiheke Island for strategic planning

problems_solutions.problem: Companies have AI budgets but don't know how to implement AI
problems_solutions.solution: Offer consultancy services for use case identification and development partnerships

startup_ideas.idea: AI implementation consultancy for mid-market companies
startup_ideas.target_market: Companies with allocated AI budgets but lacking implementation knowledge
startup_ideas.problem_solved: Use case identification and ROI calculation for AI implementations
startup_ideas.validation: High demand evidenced by 3,000 leads requesting AI conversations

mistakes_to_avoid.mistake: Jumping to fully productized service model immediately
mistakes_to_avoid.consequences: Would be a stretch without proper market validation
mistakes_to_avoid.prevention: Start with consultancy approach to understand market needs first
mistakes_to_avoid.example: Team deciding against immediate productization in favor of consultation-first approach
